text: Joaquim da Silva Carvalho (18 April 1937 – 5 April 2022) was a Portuguese footballer who played as a goalkeeper. He made six appearances for the Portugal national football team from 1965 until 1966. Carvalho died on 5 April 2022, thirteen days before his 85th birthday. ==Honours== Sporting CP *Primeira Liga: 1961–62, 1965–66, 1969–70 *Taça de Portugal: 1962–63 *UEFA Cup Winners' Cup: 1963–64 Portugal *FIFA World Cup third place: 1966 ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Portuguese footballers
title: Joaquim Carvalho
